SELECT

PATH "/Message",
PATH "/Severity",
PATH "/EventType"

WHERE
OFTYPE ns=1;i=5001

/*

1.
SELECT PATH "/Message", PATH "/Severity", PATH "/EventType"
WHERE
$4
FOR
$4:= OFTYPE ns=1;i=5001


*/
